title: [Large-Scale] University Mathematics Job-Application Course Based on Extreme Apprenticeship

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics (calculus, linear algebra) and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening mathematical modeling competencies for in-service professionals to solve workplace problems, with real-time feedback in VR simulation environments

learning_goals: Independently design math models based on real-world work scenarios at least three times
Assess the validity of mathematical solutions with over 80% accuracy in VR simulation environments
Propose at least two improvement strategies for peers' math models using peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
